title: Storefront: update price to $45 and label as Preorder

requirements.summary: Update displayed product price to $45 everywhere in the UI, including the product page and Cash App instructions modal.
acceptanceCriteria: On the product page, the displayed price reads "$45" (and not "$25").
In the Cash App instructions modal, the displayed payment amount reads "$45" in all places it appears (amount section and any note/reminder text).
No "$25" price text remains visible in the app UI.

file_operations.description: Change the main product price display from "$25" to "$45" and ensure any other user-visible price text on the product page reflects $45. Continue using the existing shadcn-ui Button for the CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the Cash App instructions modal amount text from "$25" to "$45" (including the Amount section and the Important note/reminder). Continue using the existing shadcn-ui Dialog and Button components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a visible Preorder label on the product page and update the primary call-to-action messaging to reflect preorder status.
acceptanceCriteria: A visible "Preorder" label is shown alongside the product on the main product page (e.g., near the product title).
The primary purchase call-to-action reflects preorder status (e.g., "Preorder" / "Preorder Now" instead of "Buy Now", or equivalent wording).
User-facing preorder wording is in English.

file_operations.description: Add a clear "Preorder" label near the product title and update the primary CTA button text to preorder wording (e.g., "Preorder Now"). Update adjacent helper text to reflect preorder context while preserving the existing images and layout. Continue using the existing shadcn-ui Button for the CTA; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
